Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to a Herkimer county recording tax to be imposed on the obligation secured by a mortgage on real property
Summary: Extends Herkimer county's mortgage recording tax authorization until 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 549 of the laws of 2005 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Herkimer to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property, in relation to the expiration thereof
